item.title: Topic Index
item.description: The following is a list of topics and skills covered during the semester. This will grow as we progress through the coursework. Italicized items are only covered in the readings. If you have additions or suggestions, please let Chris know! A-D Analysis development (Course Preview, Lecture-01, Lecture-02, Lecture-04) base, see “R, base“ Cartography Basic design principles (Lecture-01) Visual hirearchy (Lecture-04) Coral, Lilian (Course Preview) Data Open data (Course Preview, Lecture-01) stlData, see “Data, stlData“ devtools, see “GitHub, Install packages from“ E-H Git (Lecture-02) GitHub Install packages from with devtools, install_github() (Lecture-01) Integration with Git workflow (Lecture-02) I-L Interactive maps in R with leaflet (Lecture-01), see also “leaflet“ Los Angeles GeoHub (Course Preview) leaflet, see also “Interactive maps” Adding map tiles, addTiles() (Lecture-01) Adding markers to map, addMarkers() (Lecture-01) Adding tiles from other providers, addProviderTiles() (Lecture-01) Creating map widget, leaflet() (Lecture-01) Literate programming (Lecture-02) M-P magrittr, see “Pipe operator, %>%“ Packages, see “R, Packages“ Parker, Hilary (Course Preview) Pipe operator, %>% (Lecture-01) Public saftey Cyclist saftey (Course Preview) Pedestrian saftey (Course Preview) Q-T R base install packages from CRAN, install.
